abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Rehabilitation
            Loan Project are: to support Kazakstan's reform
            program; to ease the shortage of a foreign exchange
            component required to finance critical imports of inputs,
            raw materials and spare parts in key sectors; and to support
            foreign exchange markets and allow the private sector access
            to foreign exchange. The Kazakstani government recognizes
            that it must deliver growth and employment as it
            restructures the economy. The program discussed in this
            report will provide the systematic support for macroeconomic
            stabilization and long term efficient development. The
            project will finance imports comprised of a foreign exchange
            component and a preidentified imports component. The foreign
            exchange component will support access of importers to the
            foreign exchange auction market for financing imports
            through established commercial practices. The preidentified
            import component will finance essential imports required for
            the continued delivery of essential public services and a
            recovery in key productive sectors.
